spatial_accuracy.notes: General floor plan layout and room adjacency are well-preserved. However, the laundry room and adjacent closets in the bottom left have been merged into a single vague utility space. Window and door placements are mostly accurate, though the entry door is incorrectly rendered as a double-door swing.

structural_fidelity.notes: The model is a correct cutaway with the roof removed. No text or UI elements are present. However, there is some structural reinterpretation in the utility area (laundry/closet) and the main entrance hallway walls show slight alignment distortions compared to the 2D blueprint.

furniture_mapping.notes: Excellent block-style furniture mapping. Kitchen counters, living room sofa set, and bedroom layouts match the 2D symbols accurately. Scaling is consistent throughout.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect adherence to style constraints. The model is low-poly, flat-shaded, utilizes simple colors without textures, and is presented in a correct isometric orthographic view on a neutral dark background.

detected_errors.description: The entry door shows a double-swing arc hallucination not present in the 2D plan.
Structural reinterpretation of the laundry and closet area into a singular undefined room.
Minor wall alignment distortion in the hallway/laundry junction.
